tweet: However, the impact of COVID-19 has already been hard felt in our economy.   More people are staying home. Businesses operations have been limited, many people have lost their jobs, and state revenues are down.

name: Governor Mike Parson
tweet: As I said yesterday, COVID-19 is having a serious impact not only on public health, but also our economy.
